/**
 * Phaser Scale Modes.
 * 
 * @name Phaser.ScaleModes
 * @enum {integer}
 * @memberof Phaser
 * @readonly
 * @since 3.0.0
 */
module.exports = {
  /**
   * Default Scale Mode (Linear).
   * 
   * @name Phaser.ScaleModes.DEFAULT
   */
  DEFAULT: 0,

  /**
   * Linear Scale Mode.
   * 
   * @name Phaser.ScaleModes.LINEAR
   */
  LINEAR: 0,

  /**
   * Nearest Scale Mode.
   * 
   * @name Phaser.ScaleModes.NEAREST
   */
  NEAREST: 1
};
